column2: The backbone of every medieval society. Hardy, simple folks living a frugal life, working hard to feed the rest of the population.\nGameplay: A higher peasant population allows a province to produce more resources!\nEach pop consumes: §Y1§! Food / §Y0.5§! Clothing / §Y1§! Materials / §F0§! Luxuries

. Skilled workers turning raw materials into products, building the .\nGameplay: A higher artisan population allows a province to produce more refined & finalized products!\nEach pop consumes: §Y1§! Food / §Y1§! Clothing / §Y2§! Materials / §F0§! Luxuries

showing great buisness acumen.\nGameplay: A higher merchant population allows a province to import from more provinces(/more goods. we'll see NOTE)!\nEach pop consumes: §Y1.5§! Food / §Y1.5§! Clothing / §Y1§! Materials / §Y1§! Luxuries
